website_summaries.verdict: Elegant angel figure includes color changing lights for an accent with a beautiful glow.
pros: At 12" in height, this Christmas tree angel is the perfect size for most trees
Uses porcelain in the head and hands, so it has a doll-like appearance
Wings and body are outlined with fiber optic light, creating a glow around the angel
cons: You'll need an extension cord to use it
Some won't like the added lighting

customer_reviews.title: Better in Person
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was going to send back until i took out box and plugged it in. Very very pretty. Decided to take to give to my moms who is in a nursing facility. This will really be pretty for her to look at as she has dementia and I hope it will be soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine1773

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful just beautiful!!!!! Omg I will be uploading a video very soon
customer_reviews.author: teasha thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new Christmas tree and wanted to change up my decorations. This angel went perfectly and I received a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Angel of Color
customer_reviews.text: The changing lights are just beautiful. I love this Angel. I have been looking for an Angel if color and was so happy to have found this one. Made my tree so beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Vialva

customer_reviews.title: I feel valued.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price and delivery time. The product is of quality, and I expect will be apart of my family's Christmases in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Can't wait for Christmas this year, so we can put it back on our tree.
customer_reviews.author: Fre

customer_reviews.title: Sparkling
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my tree topper. The multi colors were amazing to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Walton

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the item
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about the angel was the exact one i wanted and it looked amazing on top of my white Christmas 🌳
customer_reviews.author: andrew sinkfield

customer_reviews.title: Wait until it light up
customer_reviews.text: All I can is the topper is beautiful and I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Libra Wiley

customer_reviews.title: A true angel!!
customer_reviews.text: She is a beautiful angel for the top of the tree!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cranor

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My old Angel died on me. This angel was perfect she matched my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this angel tree topper
customer_reviews.text: This is really a beautiful angel. Her lights change colors. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Quality products
customer_reviews.text: I love my angel; she's beautiful with fiber optics shimmering atop my tree.
customer_reviews.author: beverly

product_meta.title: Home Accents Holiday 12 in. A/F LED Fiber Optic Angel Silver Tree Topper
product_meta.description: Use the 12 in. LED Angel Silver Tree Topper from Home Accents Holiday to put the finishing touch on your tree or tabletop. It features fiber-optic wings and body, and allows light to pass through for an ethereal look. The gown is delicately crafted with great attention to detail and made of sheer gold shimmering fabric for eye-catching allure.
feature_bullets: Features continuous color-changing fiber-optic LED light
Porcelain head and hands give it a lifelike appearance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
